languages.text: Небольшой детектор, чье призвание — улавливать ток жизни и смерти. Под стальным корпусом сокрыт иссеченный фрагмент мозга несчастного псайкера, в котором, словно в темнице, теплится последняя искра его личности. Единственное, что еще способен воспринять этот измученный разум — предсмертные муки живого существа. Почуяв их, он испускает разрушительный заряд псионической энергии.

A small detector whose purpose is to sense the currents of life and death. Its steel casing conceals an excised fragment of an unfortunate psyker's brain. Their last spark of life is caged within it. The only thing this tortured mind is still capable of perceiving are the death throes of a living being. Upon sensing them, it releases a devastating blast of psionic energy.
languages.original_text: Небольшой детектор, чье призвание — улавливать ток жизни и смерти. Единственное, что еще способен воспринять этот измученный разум — предсмертные муки живого существа. Почуяв их, он испускает разрушительный заряд псионической энергии.

Upon sensing them, it releases a devastating blast of psionic energy.

languages.text: Un pequeño detector cuya función es sentir las corrientes de la vida y la muerte. Su carcasa de acero oculta un fragmento extirpado del cerebro de un psíquico con mala suerte. La última chispa de su vida está encerrada en el interior. Lo único que su mente torturada percibe son los estertores de muerte de un ser vivo. Al percibirlos, desata un estallido devastador de energía psiónica.
languages.original_text: A small detector whose purpose is to sense the currents of life and death. Its steel casing conceals an excised fragment of an unfortunate psyker's brain. Their last spark of life is caged within it. The only thing this tortured mind is still capable of perceiving are the death throes of a living being. Upon sensing them, it releases a devastating blast of psionic energy.

traits.locale_text: Un pequeño detector cuya función es sentir las corrientes de la vida y la muerte. Su carcasa de acero oculta un fragmento extirpado del cerebro de un psíquico con mala suerte. La última chispa de su vida está encerrada en el interior. Lo único que su mente torturada percibe son los estertores de muerte de un ser vivo. Al percibirlos, desata un estallido devastador de energía psiónica.

languages.text: Un petit détecteur capable de déceler les courants éthérés de la vie et de la mort. Son boîtier d'acier renferme le fragment excisé du cerveau d'un malheureux psyker, dont l'ultime étincelle de vie y est emprisonnée pour toujours. L'esprit torturé n'est plus capable de percevoir qu'une seule chose : les derniers instants d'agonie d'un être vivant. Quand cela survient, il déclenche immédiatement une explosion dévastatrice d'énergie psionique.
languages.original_text: A small detector whose purpose is to sense the currents of life and death. Its steel casing conceals an excised fragment of an unfortunate psyker's brain. Their last spark of life is caged within it. The only thing this tortured mind is still capable of perceiving are the death throes of a living being. Upon sensing them, it releases a devastating blast of psionic energy.

traits.locale_text: Un petit détecteur capable de déceler les courants éthérés de la vie et de la mort. Son boîtier d'acier renferme le fragment excisé du cerveau d'un malheureux psyker, dont l’ultime étincelle de vie y est emprisonnée pour toujours. L'esprit torturé n'est plus capable de percevoir qu'une seule chose : les derniers instants d'agonie d'un être vivant. Quand cela survient, il déclenche immédiatement une explosion dévastatrice d'énergie psionique.

languages.text: 这个小型探测器唯一的用途，就是感知生死之间的微弱电流。它的钢质外壳中存放着某位不幸的灵能者的脑部切片，将其最后一缕灵力禁锢其中。这缕受尽折磨的灵魂唯一能感知到的感觉，就是生命临终前的剧痛。一旦感知到这种剧痛，它就会立刻释放毁灭性的灵能爆炸。
languages.original_text: A small detector whose purpose is to sense the currents of life and death. Its steel casing conceals an excised fragment of an unfortunate psyker's brain. Their last spark of life is caged within it. The only thing this tortured mind is still capable of perceiving are the death throes of a living being. Upon sensing them, it releases a devastating blast of psionic energy.

traits.locale_text: 这个小型探测器唯一的用途，就是感知生死之间的微弱电流。它的钢质外壳中存放着某位不幸的灵能者的脑部切片，将其最后一缕灵力禁锢其中。这缕受尽折磨的灵魂唯一能感知到的感觉，就是生命临终前的剧痛。一旦感知到这种剧痛，它就会立刻释放毁灭性的灵能爆炸。

languages.text: 生と死の流れを感知することを目的とした小型探知機。その鋼鉄の筐体には、不幸な異能者の脳の切片が隠されている。彼らの最後の生命の輝きが、その中に閉じ込められているのだ。この苦しみに満ちた精神が唯一知覚できるのは、生き物の死の鼓動だけだ。それを感知すると、破壊的なサイオニック・エネルギーを放出するのだ。
languages.original_text: A small detector whose purpose is to sense the currents of life and death. Its steel casing conceals an excised fragment of an unfortunate psyker's brain. Their last spark of life is caged within it. The only thing this tortured mind is still capable of perceiving are the death throes of a living being. Upon sensing them, it releases a devastating blast of psionic energy.

traits.locale_text: 生と死の流れを感知することを目的とした小型探知機。その鋼鉄の筐体には、不幸な異能者の脳の切片が隠されている。彼らの最後の生命の輝きが、その中に閉じ込められているのだ。この苦しみに満ちた精神が唯一知覚できるのは、生き物の死の鼓動だけだ。それを感知すると、破壊的なサイオニック・エネルギーを放出するのだ。

languages.text: Ein kleiner Detektor, der dazu dient, die Strömungen von Leben und Tod zu spüren. Der Stahlmantel birgt ein Stück eines Gehirns, das einem unglückseligen Psioniker herausgeschnitten wurde. Der letzte Lebensfunke steckt noch darin. Das Einzige, was dieser gepeinigte Verstand noch wahrnehmen kann, sind die Todeszuckungen eines lebenden Wesens. Wenn es sie spürt, sondert es einen verheerenden Schwall psionischer Energie ab.
languages.original_text: A small detector whose purpose is to sense the currents of life and death. Its steel casing conceals an excised fragment of an unfortunate psyker's brain. Their last spark of life is caged within it. The only thing this tortured mind is still capable of perceiving are the death throes of a living being. Upon sensing them, it releases a devastating blast of psionic energy.

Der Stahlmantel birgt ein Stück eines Gehirns, das einem unglückseligen Psioniker herausgeschnitten wurde. Der letzte Lebensfunke steckt noch darin. languages.text: Yaşam ve ölüm akımlarını algılama amacıyla tasarlanmış küçük bir dedektör. Çelik kasası, talihsiz bir ruhsezerin beyninden kesilen bir parçayı muhafaza eder. Ruhsezerin son yaşam kıvılcımları bu parçaya hapsedilmiştir. Bu işkence görmüş zihnin artık algılayabildiği tek şey, yaşayan bir varlığın ölüm sancılarıdır. Onları algıladığında da yıkıcı bir ruhsezisel enerji patlaması yayar.
languages.original_text: A small detector whose purpose is to sense the currents of life and death. Its steel casing conceals an excised fragment of an unfortunate psyker's brain. Their last spark of life is caged within it. The only thing this tortured mind is still capable of perceiving are the death throes of a living being. Upon sensing them, it releases a devastating blast of psionic energy.
